extendedInfo.description: Features:- download up to three files simultaneously;- accelerated download by using multithreading (9 parts)- interception of links from the browser and clipboard;- icon of the program and downloading progress in the notification panel;- backup list of downloads and settings on SD card;- completion notification by sound and vibration;- resume after reconnection or program restart;- save different file types in different folders;- built-in browser for sites with registration;- plan files download on a schedule;- widget on your home screen;- site manager;- and many more...To disable the ads to buy the Pro version.Add links from browser:- press on link and from the window "Complete action using" select ADM (supported by Stock Browser, Dolphin, Boat Browser, Chrome)- long press on a link to display the context menu, press "Share link" and from the window "Share via" select ADM (supported by Firefox, Skyfire, Stock Browser, Dolphin, Boat Browser)- copy the link and the service will intercept the link (supported by Maxthon)Controls:- press on the download to start/stop the process;- press on the completed download to open the file;- long press on download to display the context menu.NOTE: YouTube is not supported under the rules of Google.

reviews.title: really nice!
reviews.comment: excellent app for downloading! queue option is very nice! but, when number of records increases the app gets little bit slow! otherwise, everything nice!
reviews.author: Arif Rahman

reviews.title: Problem
reviews.comment: Alot of downloads are opening as browser and are not downloading where as the default and browser downloaders are working fine Plz fix this it started after ypu added a browser to ADM

reviews.comment: I am glad to say that this is only download manager I like. It\'s speed and new interface is very good.

reviews.title: Great features
reviews.comment: But when I add two files with same name but different files. It show s download completed instead of downloading a new one.....
